history.title: Great Canadian Casino Resort
history.description2: Great Canadian Casino Resort is a modern entertainment destination combining gaming, relaxation, and diverse dining experiences. Guests can enjoy a luxurious atmosphere and top-tier service. The resort features spacious gaming areas, stylish accommodations, restaurants for every taste, and venues for concerts and events.
history.description3: It’s an ideal spot for both gaming enthusiasts and those seeking vibrant experiences and leisure in one place. Its convenient location makes it appealing for travelers and business visitors alike.

customHtml.title: The Grandeur and Thrill of Great Canadian Casino Resort
customHtml.description:
Great Canadian Casino Resort in Toronto is more than just a casino; it’s a world of entertainment and luxury designed for those who appreciate elegance and excitement. Located near the airport and the iconic Woodbine Racetrack, the resort combines modern design, spacious gaming floors, and an atmosphere of pure thrill. As Canada’s largest casino, it boasts thousands of slot machines and numerous tables for classic games.


The on-site hotel offers 400 stylish rooms with panoramic racetrack views, along with a spa, fitness center, and indoor pool. It’s the perfect retreat after a vibrant day. Guests enjoy top-tier services, including free Wi-Fi and airport transfers, ensuring maximum comfort throughout their stay.


The resort is renowned for its culinary diversity. Indulge in juicy steaks at Copperhorn Meet House, savor creative dishes at CAS·SU·AL, or immerse yourself in authentic Asian flavors. Chic bars serve signature cocktails and light bites, turning every evening into a celebration of taste and socializing.


Entertainment takes center stage with a 5,000-seat venue hosting world-class concerts and dazzling shows, while the poker room operates 24/7, offering tournaments for both pros and beginners. The resort also features special events, including sports screenings and themed parties, making every visit unique.


Special attention is given to bonus offers and the Great Canadian Rewards loyalty program. Members enjoy exclusive perks such as discounted stays, VIP access, personalized deals, and the ability to earn points with every game. This transforms the experience into not only an exciting adventure but also a rewarding one for regular guests.


Rules for Visiting Great Canadian Casino Resort

Visiting the casino requires following certain guidelines to ensure comfort and safety for all guests. Key requirements include age, dress code, and conduct on the premises.


General Rules

  • • Entry allowed only for guests 18+ (or 19+, depending on province).
  • • Must present valid photo ID.
  • • Follow responsible gaming and behavior standards.

Dress Code

  • • Neat attire: torn clothes and beachwear prohibited.
  • • Closed shoes are preferred.
  • • Sportswear allowed only in casual areas.

Conditions of Entry

  • • No outside alcohol or drugs permitted.
  • • Photography restricted in gaming areas.
  • • Bags may be checked at entry.
  • • Aggressive behavior or rule violations not tolerated.

Great Canadian Rewards Loyalty Program

The Great Canadian Rewards program is designed for regular guests, offering exclusive bonuses, discounts, and privileges. Membership is free and easy to register online or at the casino. The more you play, the higher your tier and benefits. Points are earned on slots, table games, and even dining or hotel spending. They can be redeemed for gaming credits, hotel discounts, and event tickets.


Key Advantages

  • • Free membership and instant sign-up
  • • Points for gaming and purchases
  • • Discounts on hotel, dining, and shows
  • • VIP access for higher tiers
  • • Exclusive promotions and prize draws

Bonuses and Numbers

  • • 1 point per $10 wagered
  • • 500 points = $5 gaming credit
  • • Monthly promotions with prizes up to $10,000

Tier Levels

  • • Silver – basic tier, welcome bonus $10
  • • Gold – from 5,000 points, 10% dining discount
  • • Platinum – from 25,000 points, free parking and priority booking
  • • Elite – from 100,000 points, personal host and VIP events

customHtml_2.title: Entertainment and Gaming at  Great Canadian Casino Resort
customHtml_2.description:
Bonuses and Special Offers at Great Canadian Casino Resort

The resort offers exciting promotions beyond its loyalty program, including cash giveaways, free play credits, and exclusive tournament events. Guests can participate in car raffles, massive jackpots, and themed seasonal offers. Holiday specials include free bets and gift cards for dining and entertainment. Concert discounts and VIP packages make the experience even more appealing. Monthly cash draws and progressive jackpots reaching millions of dollars keep the thrill alive for every visitor.


Progressive Slot Jackpots

  • • Payouts can exceed $1,000,000.
  • • Example: Mega Jackpot on Wheel of Fortune slots.

Monthly Cash Draws

  • • Prizes up to $50,000 for participants.
  • • Condition: Play throughout the month to earn entries.

Seasonal Promotions and Holiday Bonuses

  • • Free bets during Christmas or New Year.
  • • Gift cards for restaurants and shows.

Car and Tech Giveaways

  • • Example: Win a brand-new SUV or premium gadgets.
  • • Participation through earned gaming points.

Slot Tournaments with Big Prizes

  • • Prize pool up to $100,000.
  • • Weekly and monthly tournaments available.

VIP Entertainment Packages

  • • Discounts on concerts, dinners, and shows.
  • • Example: “Dinner & Show” package at half price.

Happy Hour and Gaming Credits

  • • Extra credits for deposits during special hours.
  • • Example: Deposit $100 — get $150 to play.

Popular Games at Great Canadian Casino Resort

The casino offers a vast selection of games for both beginners and seasoned players. Slot machines with progressive jackpots dominate the floor, alongside classic table games like blackjack, roulette, and baccarat. Poker enthusiasts can enjoy a dedicated poker room with tournaments and cash games. VIP areas cater to high rollers with elevated betting limits. The slot lineup includes top brands and themed games, ensuring variety and excitement. Guests can also join regular tournaments for big prizes and experience electronic versions of traditional games.


Slot Machines

  • • Over 4,800 machines available.
  • • Popular titles: Wheel of Fortune, Buffalo Gold, Lightning Link.
  • • Progressive jackpots exceeding $1,000,000.

Roulette

  • • European and American versions.
  • • Electronic tables for faster play.

Blackjack

  • • Classic and bonus bet variations.
  • • Minimum bets from $10, VIP tables up to $5,000.

Baccarat

  • • A favorite among high rollers.
  • • Private VIP rooms available.

Poker

  • • Texas Hold’em, Omaha, and more.
  • • Daily tournaments with prizes up to $100,000.

Craps

  • • Dynamic dice game with high odds.
  • • Perfect for thrill-seekers.

Minimum and Maximum Bets at Great Canadian Casino

Great Canadian Casino Resort offers flexible betting limits for all types of players — from beginners to high rollers. The table below shows minimum and maximum limits for popular games so you can plan your budget in advance.


Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
Slot Machines 0.01 CAD 100 CAD
Roulette 5 CAD 2,000 CAD
Blackjack 10 CAD 5,000 CAD
Baccarat 25 CAD 10,000 CAD
Poker (Tournaments) 50 CAD (buy-in) 5,000 CAD (buy-in)
Craps 10 CAD 3,000 CAD

Events and Entertainment at Great Canadian Casino Resort

Great Canadian Casino Resort Toronto is more than Canada’s largest casino — it’s a full-scale entertainment hub. The centerpiece is The Theatre, featuring cutting-edge sound and lighting for concerts, comedy shows, and theatrical performances. Guests can enjoy world-class acts from rock bands and pop stars to stand-up comedians and dance productions.


Regular events include live music nights, comedy evenings, dance shows, and holiday specials. With Live Nation partnerships, the resort hosts top-tier performers like Joe Bonamassa, Our Lady Peace, and Madhuri Dixit, along with themed productions such as “Dancing With The Stars: Live!” and festive concerts.


Nightlife lovers will find VIP lounges and bars offering DJ parties, cocktail nights, and exclusive gatherings for high rollers. Additionally, the resort features experience packages like the “Celebration Package” with dining and slot play or the “High Roller Package” with private gaming access and luxury accommodations.


World-Class Concerts

  • • Examples: Joe Bonamassa, Air Supply, Our Lady Peace.
  • • Genres: rock, pop, jazz, ethnic music.

Live Music and Themed Nights

  • • Regular lounge concerts.
  • • DJ parties and cocktail events.

Comedy Shows and Stand-Up

  • • Performers: Steve Martin & Martin Short, Jeff Dunham.
  • • Evening sessions at The Theatre.

Sports and Unique Shows

  • • Example: Global Elite Arm Wrestling.
  • • Competitive entertainment events.

VIP Events and Private Parties

  • • Exclusive for High Roller Package guests.
  • • Private zones with premium service.

Dance and Theatrical Productions

  • • Example: “Dancing With The Stars: Live!”
  • • Holiday-themed performances.

Seasonal and Holiday Programs

  • • Christmas Specials, New Year Parties.
  • • Themed dinners and festive shows.

Restaurants, Bars & Relaxation at Great Canadian Casino Resort

Great Canadian Casino Resort Toronto offers more than gaming — it’s a full luxury experience. The on-site hotel features 400 modern rooms with racetrack views, sleek design, free Wi-Fi, a fitness center, and an indoor pool. Guests enjoy complimentary airport shuttle and 24-hour service for ultimate convenience.


Dining options are diverse and upscale. Copperhorn Meet House serves premium steaks and fine wines, while CAS·SU·AL gastropub offers craft beers and hearty bites. Seafood lovers can visit Lobster Legend for Cantonese-style dishes with a modern twist. Quick bites are available at Tim Hortons and Bourbon St. Grill, plus multiple choices in the Woodbine Centre food court. Bars and lounges host DJ parties, cocktail nights, and themed events for a true Vegas vibe. [tripadvisor.ru], [narcity.com]


Relaxation goes beyond dining and gaming. Guests can unwind at the spa, swim in the pool, or enjoy live shows at the resort’s entertainment venue. Experience Packages combine accommodation, dining, and event tickets for a seamless and exciting getaway.


List of Relaxation Spots with Short Description

  • • Copperhorn Meet House: Premium steakhouse with curated wine list.
  • • CAS·SU·AL Gastropub: Craft beers and shareable plates in a cozy setting.
  • • Lobster Legend: Cantonese-style seafood with fusion flavors.
  • • Tim Hortons: Coffee and quick snacks for on-the-go.
  • • Stella Artois Terrace: Racetrack-view bar with cocktails and light bites.
  • • Woodbine Centre Food Court: Bourbon St. Grill, Sushi House, Osmow’s — global cuisines.
  • • Great Canadian Casino Resort Hotel: 400 rooms, pool, fitness center, free Wi-Fi, shuttle.
  • • Spa & Wellness Zone: Massages, body treatments, relaxation therapies.
  • • Lounges & Bars: DJ parties, cocktail nights, VIP high-roller areas.

items.title: Are ATMs available at the casino?
items.answer: Yes, ATMs are located in the casino and hotel areas.

items.title: Can I use foreign currency?
items.answer: No, all transactions are in Canadian dollars. Currency exchange is available at the cashier.

items.title: What languages are supported at the casino?
items.answer: English is the main language. Staff also speaks French, and multilingual materials are available.

items.title: Do I need to register to enter the casino?
items.answer: Yes, registration is required to get a player card and access games. It only takes a few minutes.

items.title: Is the casino open 24/7?
items.answer: Yes, the casino operates 24/7, including weekends and holidays.
